biotools.summary: A de novo motif discovery algorithm  which uses pure probabilistic mixture model to model the motif’s binding features and uses expectation maximization (EM) algorithms to simultaneously learn the sequence motif, position, and sequence rank preferences without asking for any prior knowledge from the user.

bioschemas.name: SEME
bioschemas.summary: A de novo motif discovery algorithm  which uses pure probabilistic mixture model to model the motif’s binding features and uses expectation maximization (EM) algorithms to simultaneously learn the sequence motif, position, and sequence rank preferences without asking for any prior knowledge from the user.
